articles.title: Chris Rock unleashes on Will Smith and wife Jada a year after Oscars slap; says he watched 'Emancipation' - Indiatimes.com

articles.content: A year after he was slapped on stage at the Academy Awards, Chris Rock hammered Will Smith and his wife in a comedy special streamed live around the world, joking that he enjoyed seeing the actor bea… [+2272 chars]
